    • Constructor Detail

      • SeparatorCase

        public SeparatorCase(java.lang.CharSequence separator,
                     java.lang.Boolean upper)
        Constructs with given separator and upper setting. If upper setting is not null, this case will process each split part from split(CharSequence) by upper setting. If upper setting is null, there is no case process for each split part.
        Parameters:
        separator - given separator
        upper - upper setting

    • Method Detail

      • split

        public java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> split(java.lang.CharSequence chars)
        Description copied from interface: GekCase
        Splits given chars into a word list with rules of this implementation. Default implementations use GekString.subChars(CharSequence, int, int) to build sub-sequence.
        Specified by:
        split in interface GekCase
        Parameters:
        chars - given chars
        Returns:
        split word list

      • join

        public java.lang.String join(java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> words)
        Description copied from interface: GekCase
        Joins given split words to one String in rules of this case. It is assumed that the words is split by GekCase.split(CharSequence).
        Specified by:
        join in interface GekCase
        Parameters:
        words - given split words
        Returns:
        joined string
